Sentencas: Direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs) are recognized as an efficient energy conversion device.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With regard to their operation mechanism, the reverse Boudouard reaction rate is the crucial factor influencing cell performance.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a new-type catalyst derived from industrial barium slag (BS) was first developed to enhance the reverse Boudouard reaction and DC-SOFC performance.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The chemical composition and micro morphologies of BS and barium slag-derived catalyst (BSC) were characterized in detail.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The superiorities of BS and BSC were reflected in the enhanced DC-SOFC performance and high fuel utilization.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The single cell fueled by BSC-loaded carbon yielded the best output of 249 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This result was comparable to the 266 mW cm(-2) output of a hydrogen-fueled SOFC due to the superior catalytic activity of metallic catalysts toward carbon gasification.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The advantage of the BSC was also observed in the durable operation of the corresponding DC-SOFCs, which lasted for 36.2 h at 50 mA with the fuel utilization of 29.0%.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This work provides a new channel for green and efficient utilization of BS and other industrial residues, and a novel option to the development of energy conversion technology.
Titulo: Highly efficient utilization of industrial barium slag for carbon gasification in direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells
